data.actual_result: Card is still present, but no new windows show up.
data.expected_result: Card should exit (temporary like nickname change), and window should show up with the settings.
data.short_description: User Profile Card Doesn't Closes When Viewing Notification / Privacy Settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on a server. - Go over to the Member List, and click on someone's profile (Ex. Dabbit's on DTesters) - View the profile, and click on Mutual Servers - Right click another server (ex. DFeedback) - Click on Notification or Privacy Settings
